item.description:
Have you heard about Cleanse America? A fab group of raw food enthusiasts have organized this national cleanse & I wanted to invite you to join in. Here's what the Cleanse America team has to say:
"We invite you to participate in a 10 day cleanse and be a part of the transformation of a nation!! We just announced our 1st official cleanse dates, which are:
Mon. APRIL 9th - Wed. APRIL18th!
The guidelines are simple. For 10 days you eat a 100% raw foods diet (Level 1) or follow a liquid diet (Level 2) of juices, smoothies, elixers, teas and soups.
If you have any questions please check out our Facebook Page : https://www.facebook.com/CleanseAmerica or visit the website: http://www.cleanseamerica.com/

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: CLEANSE AMERICA - A 10 Day Raw Food Fast - April 9th-18th
